name: Alolan Meowth

evolution.description: Alolan Meowth can evolve into Alolan Persian at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Scratch Cat Pokémon. When its delicate pride is wounded, or when the gold coin on its forehead is dirtied, it flies into a hysterical rage.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
